# Supraventricular Tachycardia (SVT) {#sec-svt}

-   SVT is a "grab bag" term for tachyarrhythmias originating "above the ventricle"

## Irregular tachycardias (narrow complex)

-   Multifocal atrial tachycardia (MAT) (Figure @fig-irregtachy A)
-   atrial flutter with "variable conduction" (Figure @fig-irregtachy B)
-   atrial fibrillation (Figure @fig-irregtachy C)
    -   For more information, see @sec-afib

![The types of narrow complex irregular tachyarrhythmias: (A) MAT, (B) AFlutter with variable conduction, and (C) AFib.](images/cards-irreg-tachy.jpg){#fig-irregtachy}
